description: Modifies an indexing rule's configuration. Indexing rules are used for determining the sampling rate for spans indexed from CloudWatch Logs. For more information, see Transaction Search.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of the indexing rule to be updated.

parameters.name: Rule
parameters.description: Rule configuration to be updated. Probabilistic (dict) --- Indexing rule configuration that is used to probabilistically sample traceIds. Configured sampling percentage of traceIds. Note that sampling can be subject to limits to ensure completeness of data.

nested_params.name: Probabilistic
nested_params.description: Indexing rule configuration that is used to probabilistically sample traceIds.

nested_params.name: DesiredSamplingPercentage
nested_params.description: Configured sampling percentage of traceIds. Note that sampling can be subject to limits to ensure completeness of data.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the indexing rule.

nested_items.name: ModifiedAt
nested_items.description: Displays when the rule was last modified, in Unix time seconds.

nested_items.name: Probabilistic
nested_items.description: Indexing rule configuration that is used to probabilistically sample traceIds.

nested_items.name: DesiredSamplingPercentage
nested_items.description: Configured sampling percentage of traceIds. Note that sampling can be subject to limits to ensure completeness of data.
